Return the 7 crs in a named vector

Source: R/crs.R
crs7.Rd

Return the 7 crs in a named vector

crs7()

Value

character vector of PROJ strings

Examples

crs7()
#>                                                                                                         AF 
#>   "+proj=aeqd +lat_0=8.5 +lon_0=21.5 +x_0=5621452.01998 +y_0=5990638.42298 +datum=WGS84 +units=m +no_defs" 
#>                                                                                                         AN 
#>      "+proj=aeqd +lat_0=-90 +lon_0=0 +x_0=3714266.97719 +y_0=3402016.50625 +datum=WGS84 +units=m +no_defs" 
#>                                                                                                         AS 
#>      "+proj=aeqd +lat_0=47 +lon_0=94 +x_0=4340913.84808 +y_0=4812712.92347 +datum=WGS84 +units=m +no_defs" 
#>                                                                                                         EU 
#>      "+proj=aeqd +lat_0=53 +lon_0=24 +x_0=5837287.81977 +y_0=2121415.69617 +datum=WGS84 +units=m +no_defs" 
#>                                                                                                         NA 
#>   "+proj=aeqd +lat_0=52 +lon_0=-97.5 +x_0=8264722.17686 +y_0=4867518.35323 +datum=WGS84 +units=m +no_defs" 
#>                                                                                                         OC 
#> "+proj=aeqd +lat_0=-19.5 +lon_0=131.5 +x_0=6988408.5356 +y_0=7654884.53733 +datum=WGS84 +units=m +no_defs" 
#>                                                                                                         SA 
#>  "+proj=aeqd +lat_0=-14 +lon_0=-60.5 +x_0=7257179.23559 +y_0=5592024.44605 +datum=WGS84 +units=m +no_defs"
